subject: Sex Crimes
Assaults
lead_paragraph: The police in Milledgeville, Ga., who are investigating a woman’s claim that Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger sexually assaulted her, said they expected to interview Roethlisberger and about eight other people in the next several days.
